testsuites.type: Modal verb: _should_ for all persons and tenses in negation
testsuites.author: Golam Mortuza Hossain

sentence.english: I should not have been working.

testsuites.sentence: I should not have been working.

sentence.english: You should not have been working.

testsuites.sentence: You should not have been working.

sentence.english: She should not have been working.

testsuites.sentence: She should not have been working.

sentence.english: This machine should not be working.
sentence.expected_bengali: এই মেশিনটির কাজ করা উচিত নয়।

testsuites.sentence: This machine should not be working.

sentence.english: This machine should not have worked.
sentence.expected_bengali: এই মেশিনটির কাজ করা উচিত হয়নি।

testsuites.sentence: This machine should not have worked.

sentence.english: This car should not have air-conditioner.
sentence.expected_bengali: এই গাড়িটির বাতানুকুল যন্ত্র থাকা উচিত নয়।

testsuites.sentence: This car should not have air-conditioner.

sentence.english: It should not have been done.

testsuites.sentence: It should not have been done.
